headline: Decades of Dependability: How Franklin Resources (BEN) Earned its Dividend Champion Title
summary: Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) is included among the Best Dividend Stocks for a Dividend Champions List. An American multinational investment management company, Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) is lesser-known among dividend investors. However, the company’s dividend policy is commendable. It’s just one year away from becoming a Dividend King, which means that BEN has been rewarding […]
